name: Who Muted Uncle Marcus?
description:
The family quiz is a long-held tradition but this year, Abby receives some shocking news: someone has poisoned Uncle Marcus! Make decisions throughout the story to uncover the truth and try to save him before it is too late.



• Shot in lockdown and filmed simultaneously in London and Los Angeles
• Unlock different videos to reveal the evidence for each character
• Use the evidence to accuse someone and reveal the truth
• Interactive movie lasting 60-80 minutes with multiple playthroughs
• From the studios behind The Complex, Five Dates, Night Book and Bloodshore



Cast
+ Andy Buckley (The Office)
+ Susannah Doyle (Black Mirror)
+ Robbie Kay (Once Upon a Time)
+ Gabrielle Glaister (Blackadder Goes Forth)
+ Eileen Davies (High-Rise)
+ Abigail Hardingham (The Missing)
+ Georgia Small (Five Dates)
+ Al Weaver (The Complex)
